message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1200000 to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer it to you at an exceptional price of $950000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. We believe this price reflects the true value of the product while offering you a substantial savings. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
